item.title: RoyalScape Revolutionz 317
item.dc:creator: @ponqueque ponqueque
item.description:
@ponqueque wrote:

Updates

Edited Kalphite Queen Lair, (npc clipping)
Npc Drops
Xp Rates
Added Donator Zone
Added some portals

Quests

Lost City
Rune Mysteries
Desert Treasure
Vampire Slayer
Monkey Madness
Sheep Shearer
Legends Quest
Lunar Diplomacy
Knights legend
Lunar Spirit
The wolf’s cure
The Restless Ghost
Dorics Quest

item.title: RoyalScape Revolutionz 317
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

ponqueque:

We actually do have working quests

Then you should list them. Also, while you’re at it, you should list every-single Update, Patch, Glitch-fix, Exploit Patch, etc. This way Users and your Community can see how much work you’re putting into it, and you won’t get negative feedback.

Read full topic

item.title: RoyalScape Revolutionz 317
item.dc:creator: @ponqueque ponqueque
item.description:
@ponqueque wrote:

We actually do have working quests, idk if I forgot to list it up there, and we do also have a pretty good variety of mini games, and lastly yeah, this is a new server. The old one had to many glitches in it.

Read full topic

item.title: RoyalScape Revolutionz 317
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:2, topic:466624”]Didn’t you already create an advertisement? I’m just going to assume this is a new server.

Well first off, I see nothing new here. All you did was list features that can be found in most, if not all servers. I’m not even going to mention your media, seeing as you’re only showing bosses and a few other basic features. Now, if I were in your position and needed players I’d put a bit more effort into my server making sure my community would have a great experience. By this I mean, unique/original mini-games, quests, skills, etc. Basically anything that would ensure success for my server.

Good luck.[/quote]
But…but his name is Andrew…He could be the creator of RS…

Read full topic

item.title: RoyalScape Revolutionz 317
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

Didn’t you already create an advertisement? I’m just going to assume this is a new server.

Well first off, I see nothing new here. All you did was list features that can be found in most, if not all servers. I’m not even going to mention your media, seeing as you’re only showing bosses and a few other basic features. Now, if I were in your position and needed players I’d put a bit more effort into my server making sure my community would have a great experience. By this I mean, unique/original mini-games, quests, skills, etc. Basically anything that would ensure success for my server.

Good luck.

Read full topic
